plantuml:
@startuml
skinparam componentStyle uml2
skinparam sequenceArrowThickness 2
skinparam sequenceBoxBorderColor Black
skinparam sequenceLifeLineBorderColor Black
skinparam sequenceActorBorderColor Black
skinparam sequenceParticipantBorderColor Black
skinparam sequenceObjectBorderColor Black

actor User as user

participant "Web Browser" as browser
participant "Web Server" as server
participant "Authentication Service" as auth
database "User Database" as db

activate user
user -> browser : Requests Login Page
activate browser

browser -> server : GET /login
activate server

server -> browser : Sends Login Page (HTML, CSS, JS)
deactivate server

browser -> user : Displays Login Form
deactivate browser

user -> browser : Enters Credentials (Username, Password)
activate browser

browser -> server : POST /login (Username, Password)
activate server

server -> auth : Sends Authentication Request (Username, Password)
activate auth

auth -> db : Queries User Database (Username)
activate db

db --> auth : Returns User Data (Hashed Password, Salt, etc.)
deactivate db

auth -> auth : Compares Hashed Password from DB with Hashed Input Password
auth -> auth : Validates User Credentials

alt Authentication Successful
    auth --> server : Authentication Success
    deactivate auth

    server -> server : Creates Session (Session ID)
    server -> db : Creates Session Record in Database (Session ID, User ID, Expiry Time)
    activate db
    db --> server : Acknowledges Session Creation
    deactivate db

    server -> browser : Sets Session Cookie (Session ID)
    server -> browser : Redirects to User Dashboard (302 Found)
    deactivate server

    browser -> server : GET /dashboard (With Session Cookie)
    activate server
    server -> db : Validates Session Cookie
    activate db
    db --> server : Returns Session Data (User ID)
    deactivate db
    server -> server : Retrieves User Data based on User ID
    server -> browser : Sends User Dashboard (HTML, CSS, JS)
    deactivate server
    browser -> user : Displays User Dashboard
    deactivate browser
    user -> user : Accesses User Dashboard
else Authentication Failed
    auth --> server : Authentication Failure
    deactivate auth

    server -> browser : Sends Error Message (Invalid Credentials)
    deactivate server

    browser -> user : Displays Error Message
    deactivate browser
end

deactivate user

@enduml
